title: Royal Institute ICT Day
description: ACICTS achieved multiple victories including Poster Design Champion (Saviru Suraweera), 2nd Runner-up (Wisula Bohingamuwa), 3D Design Champion (Sinura Vidun), and Web Development 1st Runner-up (Pasindu Ranasinghe).

title: Zahira College ICT Day
description: ACICTS secured top positions with Quiz Champions (Nisandu Athsara, Lithika Seneviratne), Digital Art Champion (Sihina Pansilu), Web Development 1st Runner-up (Nethula Peiris), and Graphic Designing 2nd Runner-up (Pulitha Adhikari).

title: Nexus’24
description: At Girls' High School Kandy’s Nexus’24, ACICTS earned Poster Design 2nd Runner-up (Manuth Ranawaka), Photo Manipulation 2nd Runner-up (Pulitha Adhikari), and Web Development Runner-up (Nisandu Athsara).

title: Nexnova’24
description: ACICTS excelled at St. Sylvester's College’s Nexnova’24 with Quiz Runner-up (Himantha Randima, Parinda Pathirana, Harindu Dilsanda, Lithika Seneviratne), Web Dev Senior Runner-up (Chethana Ranindu), Junior Champion (Thinuka Nuwanjith), and Junior Runner-up (D.D. Edirisinghe).

title: National School Software Competition (NSSC)
description: ACICTS secured Runner-up in the NSSC with an outstanding performance by Nisandu Athsara.

title: METAMORPHIX '23
description: ACICTS secured 3rd Place in Graphic Design (Pulitha Sethnidu) at Wesley College's METAMORPHIX '23.

title: SYNC '24
description: ACICTS achieved multiple victories at Dharmaraja College's SYNC '24, including eSports Championship (Dinith, Sathira, Yehan), Algorithm 3rd Place (Nisadu Athsara), Graphic Design 3rd Place (Kavindu Maleesha), and Quiz Championship (Himantha Randima, Lithika Senevirathna, Tadeesha Nithesh, Parinda Pathirana).

title: CONNEXION '24
description: At Mahamaya College's CONNEXION '24, ACICTS won Cover page designing competitions with 1st place (Sandanu Edirisooriya) and 3rd place (Tadeesha Nithesh).

title: Kingswood College Competition
description: ACICTS secured 1st place in 3D Animation (Lithika Methsilu, Gaviru Fernando, Manuth Ranawaka).

title: INFORMATIQUE '24
description: At St.Thomas College's INFORMATIQUE '24, ACICTS won 2nd place in Web Development (Nisandu Athsara, Lithika Senavirathne, Himantha Randima, Sathira, Nethula Peiris) and secured both 1st and 3rd places in Graphic Design.

title: SPLENDOUR '24
description: ACICTS dominated St. Anthony's College's SPLENDOUR '24 with multiple victories including Quiz 2nd Place (Nethula, Himantha, Parinda), Presentation Editing 1st place (Amiru Wijesiriwardhane)[junior], Poster designing 1st place (Kavindu Maleesha) and 3rd place (Pulitha Adhikari)[senior], 3D designing Junior category sweep (1st - Amiru Wijerisiwardhane, 2nd - Navitha Aken, 3rd - Dasindu Nimnal), Senior 3D designing 2nd place (Lithika Senavirathne), and Photo manipulation wins in both Junior (1st - Saviru Suraweera) and Senior (3rd - Pulitha Adhikari) categories.

title: INTELLECTA '24
description: At Devi Balika Vidyalaya's INTELLECTA '24, ACICTS secured Short Film Competition 3rd Place (Parinda Pathirana, Nethula Peiris) and 1st place in Quiz Competition.

title: CONFINITY '24
description: ACICTS achieved Overall Championship at Nalanda College's CONFINITY '24, winning Presentation Design 2nd Place (Dulshaman Edirisinghe, Nethula Peiris), Fastest Robo Coder 1st Place (Parinda Pathirana, Pasindu Dushan, Himantha Randima, Nethula Peiris), Quiz 2nd Place (Parinda Pathirana, Pasindu Dushan, Nethula Peiris, Himantha Randima), and Photo manipulation 1st and 2nd places.

title: SLIot Challenge '24
description: ACICTS emerged as the Maroons Champions at the SLIoT Challenge, a prestigious event organized by the University of Moratuwa and Sri Lanka Telecom.

title: International Achievements 2024
description: ACICTS had 4 delegates in Asia Pacific Informatics Olympiad 2024 and 4 finalists in National Informatics Olympiad 2024.

title: CODEFEST '23
description: ACICTS proudly secured the Championship title in the Senior Coding Contest at Codefest '23, a highly regarded event hosted by SLIIT.

title: MECHATRONX '23
description: ACICTS achieved 2nd place in the Robotics Competition at MechatronX '23, held by the University of Moratuwa.

title: LUNA '23
description: ACICTS demonstrated exceptional talent by securing 1st and 2nd places in AI Art, 2nd and 3rd places in Poster Designing, and 3rd place in the Quiz Competition, ultimately winning the Overall Championship at Luna '23, organized by Kingswood College.

title: NEXNOVA '23
description: ACICTS dominated with Quiz championship (Pasindu Dushan, Minuka Harshana, Ovin Perera, Nisandu Athsara), Coding Senior achievements (1st - Nisandu Athsara, 3rd - Nethula Peiris), and design victories (Logo Designing 1st - Nethula Peiris, Post Designing 3rd - Nethula Peiris).

title: TRANSCEND '23
description: ACICTS earned top honors in Quiz Championship and Poster Designing 1st Place at Transcend '23, organized by Wesley College.

title: AI ODDYSEY '23
description: ACICTS showcased their prowess by winning Quiz Championship, Algorithm Competition (1st - Pasindu Dushan, 2nd - Nisandu Athsara), 2nd place in Graphic Designing, and 2nd place in Web Development at AI Oddysey '23, organized by Visakha Vidyalaya.

title: NEXUS '23
description: ACICTS secured Quiz Competition 2nd Place, Logo Designing 1st Place, and Poster Designing 2nd Place at Girls High School, Kandy.

title: Technosphere 2023
description: Web Development winners (Chamindu Amarasinghe, Pasindu Dushan, Minuka Harshana, Shakya Peris, Nisandu Athsara).

title: IIT Cutting Edge 2022
description: Remarkable achievements across categories: O/L category 1st (Nisandu Athsara), A/L category 2nd (Pasindu Dushan), O/L category 3rd (Lithika Methsilu).

title: CODEFEST '22
description: ACICTS triumphed with Quiz Championship (Nisandu Athsara, Shakya Peiris) and Coding Contest Senior victories at Codefest '22, organized by SLIIT. The coding team included Pasindu Dushan and Minuka Harshana.

title: ISEC '22
description: ACICTS achieved 2nd place in the Gaming Tournament at ISEC '22, hosted by GamerLK and SLT Mobitel.

title: CONEXION '23
description: ACICTS claimed the championship title in the Quiz Competition (Pasindu Dushan, Shakya Peris, Nisandu Athsara) at Conexion '23, hosted by Anula Vidyalaya.

title: ENVISAGE '23
description: ACICTS won Quiz Championship (Ovin Perera, Pasindu Dushan, Shakya Peris, Minuka Harshana) and Web dev 2nd place (Pasindu Dushan, Minuka Harshana, Nuwantha Peris, Nisandu Athsara) at Envisage '23, organized by Musaeus College.

title: TEKNIK '23
description: ACICTS secured 2nd place in the Quiz Competition at Teknik '23, organized by Zahira College.

title: TEMPUZ '23
description: ACICTS earned 2nd place in the Quiz Competition and 1st place in Poster Designing at Tempuz '23, organized by Thurstan College.

title: EXELIXI '21
description: ACICTS secured 3rd place at Exelixi '21, a competitive event organized by the ICT Society of Bandaranayake College, Gampaha.

title: CODEFEST '21
description: ACICTS emerged victorious with 1st place in the Web Development Competition at Codefest '21, organized by SLIIT.

title: CODEFEST '20
description: ACICTS achieved 3rd place in the Quiz Competition at Codefest '20, organized by SLIIT.

title: ERA NOVUM '20
description: ACICTS displayed remarkable talent by winning 2nd and 3rd places at Era Novum '20, organized by the ICT Society of Musaeus College.

title: CONEXION '20
description: ACICTS secured 1st and 2nd places at Conexion '20, a competitive event organized by the ICT Society of Mahamaya Girls College, Kandy.

title: NOI '20
description: ACICTS members Chirath Nirodha and Thithiesha Mahabaduge won 3rd and 4th places respectively in the National Olympiad in Informatics '20.

title: AXCESS '20
description: ACICTS claimed 1st place in the E-Sports Competition at Axcess '20, organized by the ICT Society of St. Peter's College, Colombo.

title: INFIGO '20
description: ACICTS earned 3rd place at Infigo '20, organized by the ICT Society of Mahanama College.

title: CONSTRUCTI.CON '20
description: ACICTS won 1st place at Constructi.Con '20, organized by the ICT Society of St. Sebastian's College, Moratuwa.

title: EXPLOIT '20
description: ACICTS secured 2nd place at Exploit '20, a highly competitive event organized by the ICT Society of Wesley College.

title: NOI '19
description: Ananda College was honored as the Best Performing School at the National Olympiad in Informatics '19.

title: GCI '19
description: ACICTS members, including Chamindu Amarasinghe, achieved top positions as the Winner and Finalists in the Google Code-In '19 Competition.

title: NSSC '19
description: ACICTS members Hasala Heiyanthuduwa and Supun Edirisuriya secured 2nd and 3rd places respectively at the National Schools Software Competition '19.

title: INFOV '19
description: ACICTS member Channa Deshan won 1st place at Infov '19, an inter-school competition organized by St. Peter's College.

title: ENVISAGE '17
description: ACICTS emerged victorious, winning 2nd place at Envisage '17, organized by Musaeus College.
